description: Helping you cut down on all those wires, and potentially making way for cheaper low-end VR headsets for streaming, ElectricMaple was announced by Collabora and PlutoVR joining the likes of WiVRn and ALVR.
title: ElectricMaple joins WiVRn and ALVR in giving options to stream VR to a headset

description: If you absolutely love action-heavy dungeon crawlers like The Binding of Isaac, and the chaos from Vampire Survivors you're going to need to take a look at Heroes Of Loot: Gauntlet Of Power from Orangepixel.
title: Heroes Of Loot: Gauntlet Of Power is a fresh take on dungeon crawling with a very unique weapon

description: Time for you to get some DRM freedom? GOG has launcher their Summer Sale 2024, and you know what to expect - absolutely loads of games are now discounted.
title: GOG Summer Sale 2024 is live with thousands of discounts

description: Another contestant enters the survivor-like battle ring with Relic Abyss, and this one is absolutely packed full of features that will probably end up sucking my life away.
title: Relic Abyss is a the next big feature-heavy roguelite survivor RPG

description: Another contestant enters the survivor-like battle ring with Relic Abyss, and this one is absolutely packed full of features that will probably end up sucking my life away.
title: Relic Abyss is the next big feature-heavy roguelite survivor RPG

description: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora has now released on Steam, and at least when it comes to AMD GPUs, it seems to be currently a no-go and just doesn't run with Proton on Steam Deck and Desktop Linux.
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora now on Steam, broken for Steam Deck and Desktop Linux

description: Inspired by animated cursor-chasing cat software like Neko and the mobile app Neko Atsume, KittyToy is a simple little casual chill-out game about stray cats.
title: KittyToy is a cute little casual digital-pet game about stray cats

description: SWAP/MEAT has a really fun idea where you (and hopefully some friends) become Meat Scientists. You go planet-hopping to steal the meat of strange creatures and turn their flesh into your own body parts.
title: Swap flesh with fallen enemies in the weird upcoming co-op action game SWAP/MEAT

description: Gaijin Entertainment have released the Seek & Destroy update for War Thunder which as usual sprinkles in a bunch of new content, along with some general tweaks across the board.
title: War Thunder brings another major update with Seek & Destroy
